recipesJson.name: Dat Bubble PoP Suckka
recipesJson.author: MixinDAD
recipesJson.description: Well here it is winter time and i've finally come to a version of a Bubble pop sucker that is actually really tasty and authentic. It is very reminiscent of when you finally get to the bubble gum center in a few places if that makes sense. This is at least the 5th reversion so If ya like Candy vapes please give this one a go and let me know how ya likey
